This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0554 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As Published
LATE Late InvoiceLate InvoiceOver the Payer's published time limit for this invoiceOver the Payer's published time limit for this invoice
NORM Normal submissionNormal submission
SUB Subscriber coverage problemSubscriber coverage problem

name: InvoiceReason
title: invoiceReason
description: Code system of concepts used to specify the reason for this invoice.  Used in the Invoice (IVC) segment in HL7 Version 2.x messaging.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0554 (Invoice Reason Codes)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

property.valueString: Over the Payer's published time limit for this invoice
